name: InactivatedPolioVaccine(IPV)
title: Inactivated Polio Vaccine (IPV)
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent inactivated polio vaccines (IPV).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Immunization, Administered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with all inactivated polio vaccine (IPV) codes. This is a grouping of CVX codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: diphtheria, tetanus toxoids and acellular pertussis vaccine, Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate, and poliovirus vaccine, inactivated (DTaP-Hib-IPV)
